fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dance at a player's house. If they are attacked, the attack will be unable to fail.
- (Rehearsal) Throw flags in the air, then plant them at someone's house to give any Band member visiting them redirect, control, and roleblock immunity, and prevent their ability from failing, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Equip a rifle. You can literally just shoot someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: 2**
- If you are left with no kill-capable Band members, or are solo, your normal ability will also kill.
- If you use an ability on your target, they will learn that a Color Guard used their ability on them. They will know which. If they die, they will not be notified.
